messages.subject: Shinsengumi/Kabuki
messages.msgSnippet: I thought I d post this on both lists since it has cultural significance. http://www.eonet.ne.jp/~hase/image/graphics_image/g_up/up_shinsen_gumi_00.jpg I think
messages.messageBody:
I thought I'd post this on both lists since it has cultural significance.

http://www.eonet.ne.jp/~hase/image/graphics_image/g_up/up_shinsen_gumi_00.jpg

I think it's Okita.

Note the red lines on the face-- those are used in Kabuki plays to denote
the virility of a hero.

--M.
